Technical Support Executive 
Tech Mahindra Limited
LatestInterview.description: We are hiring for Technical Support Associate. Looking for candidates who can join us immediately and should have excellent communication skills. Shifts-24/7 Job Responsibilities: Initial point of contact for resolving customer raised network related requests specific to network equipment. Collaborate with other team members on a daily basis in order to achieve a satisfactory resolution to customer issues.
